description: To show force exerted on contraction.

description: Shows the expansion of a metal tube due to heating.

description: Shows thermal expansion of metal ball by heating.

description: Shows metling of ice to due pressure.

description: Shows cooling by evaporation.

description: Shows the varying thermal conductivity of different materials.

description: Shows the reflection, absorption and emission properties of materials.

description: Shows an interesting radiation-based thermometer.

description: Used to measure radiant flux.

description: To show that a solution of Iodine in carbon disulphide, opaque to visible light, is transparent to infrared.

description: Interesting indicators of temperature.

description: For the vaporisation of liquids.

description: A device that uses the melting of ice to measure heat

description: Demonstration of a clever heat engine.

description: a specialized glass bottle known for its unique strength and fragility

title: HY1 - Upthrust on Floating Body
description: Shows that upthrust increases as immersed volume increases.

title: HY2 - Liquid Levels
description: Liquid levels are independent of the shape of the container.

title: HY5 - Fluid Pressure
description: Shows the dependence of fluid pressure at a point on the weight of fluid above it.

title: HY6 - Hydrostatic Paradox: Pascal's Vases
description: Shows that pressure at a given depth in a fluid is the same regardless of the shape or volume of the container holding the fluid.

title: HY7 - Archimedes' principle
description: Demonstrates Archimedes' principle: the buoyant force on an object submerged in a fluid is equal to the weight of the fluid displaced by the object.

title: HY8 - Upthrust
description: Demonstrates Archimede's principle and the bouyant force.

title: HY10 - Buoys
description: Floating devices that rely on bouyancy to stay afloat.

title: HY11 - Cartesian Diver
description: Demonstrates the interplay between the properties of gas (air) and liquid (water).

title: HY12 - Vortex Action
description: Demonstrates the action of a vortex.

title: HD4 - Relaxation Oscillations
description: Demonstrates relaxation oscillations.

title: HD5- Relaxation Oscillations
description: Demonstrates relaxation oscillations.

title: HD6 - Buoyancy - Shape
description: Shows the importance of shape in buoyancy.

title: HD11 - Torricelli's Law of Efflux
description: Shows dependence of liquid pressure at a point on the volume of liquid above it.

title: AP1 - Magdeberg Hemispheres
description: Shows the strength of atmospheric pressure.

title: AP3 - Pressure gauges
description: Used to measure air pressure.

title: AP4 - Air Weighing
description: Weighing air.

title: AP7 - Air The Bernoulli Effect
description: Demonstrates the force due to pressure difference.

description: Used for atmospheric pressure measurements.

description: Accesory to demonstrations.

title: AP12 - Hand Pump
description: Used for evacuation of vessels.

title: AP13 - Glass Syringes
description: Accesory to demonstrations.

title: AD1 - Bellows and Blower
description: Accesory to demonstrations.

title: AD2 - Venturi
description: Shows the distribution of pressure through a non-uniform cross-section.

title: AD6 - Pumps
description: Shows the mechanism of diffusion pumps.

title: S1 - Propagation Needs a Medium
description: Shows that sound needs a medium in which to propagate.

title: S2 - Organ Pipes
description: Demonstrates shape of sound waves.

title: S3 - 'Gauze Tones'- Beats
description: Demonstrates the phenomenon where sound is produced by a flame burning near a wire gauze or grid within a tube.

title: S5 - Doppler effect
description: Demonstrates the Doppler effect.

title: S7 - Galton's Whistle and Sensitive Flame
description: A high-frequency whistle invented by Sir Francis Galton in 1876 to test the upper limits of human hearing and to study animal hearing.

description: Demonstrates the Curie point.

description: Shows the magnetic field surrounding a disc.
